00030 using namespace affx;
00031 using namespace std;
00032 
00033 /** 
00034  * Process another cel files worth of data.
00035  * @param cel - Filehandle to open cel file.
00036  */
00037 void CnProbeGenderCelListener::newChip(affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionCELData *cel) {
00038   std::vector<ChipSummary::Metric> metrics;
00039   m_SummaryStats.push_back(metrics);
00040   m_CelNames.push_back(cel->GetFileName());
00041   float fRatio = 0;
00042 
00043   affx::Gender gender = callGender(cel, m_ChrXProbes, m_ChrYProbes, fRatio);
00044 
00045   if (m_ZWGenderCalling) {
00046       gender = affx::flipMaleFemaleGender(gender);
00047   }
00048 
00049   m_Genders.push_back(gender);
00050   m_vRatios.push_back(fRatio);
00051 
00052   m_SummaryStats[m_SummaryStats.size()-1].push_back(ChipSummary::Metric(m_GenderName + "_gender", affx::getGenderString(gender)));
00053   setValid(true);
00054 }
00055 
00056 static inline double sumIntensities(affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionCELData *cel, 
00057                                     const vector< vector<probeid_t> > &probes)
00058 {
00059     double ret = 0.0;
00060 
00061     vector< wstring > channelNames = cel->GetChannels();
00062     // If this is a GCOS CEL file, then make up any old name for a
00063     // single channel -- subsequent call to SetActiveDataGroup will be
00064     // a no-op in this case, and GetIntensity will proceed as normal.
00065     if (channelNames.empty()) {
00066       std::wstring temp = L"Default Group";
00067       channelNames.push_back(temp);
00068     }
00069     for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < probes.size(); i++ ) {
00070         if ( probes[i].size() ) {
00071             // sum intensities for channel i
00072             cel->SetActiveDataGroup( channelNames[i] );
00073             for (vector<probeid_t>::const_iterator it = probes[i].begin(); it != probes[i].end(); ++it) {
00074               ret += cel->GetIntensity(*it);
00075             }
00076         }
00077     }
00078     return ret;
00079 }
00080 
00081 affx::Gender CnProbeGenderCelListener::callGender(affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionCELData *cel, 
00082                                                   const vector< vector<probeid_t> > &chrxProbes,
00083                                                   const vector< vector<probeid_t> > &chryProbes,
00084                                                   float& fRatio)
00085 {
00086         ///@todo check to see if chrxProbes can be a non-zero vector of empty channels
00087     unsigned int num_Xprobes = 0, num_Yprobes = 0;
00088     for ( unsigned int i = 0 ; i < chrxProbes.size(); i ++ )
00089         num_Xprobes += chrxProbes[i].size();
00090     for ( unsigned int i = 0 ; i < chryProbes.size(); i ++ )
00091         num_Yprobes += chryProbes[i].size();
00092 
00093     if (num_Xprobes == 0) {return affx::UnknownGender;}
00094     if (num_Yprobes == 0) {return affx::UnknownGender;}
00095 
00096     float meanX = sumIntensities(cel, chrxProbes)/num_Xprobes;
00097     float meanY = sumIntensities(cel, chryProbes)/num_Yprobes;
00098 
00099     m_SummaryStats[m_SummaryStats.size()-1].push_back(ChipSummary::Metric(m_GenderName + "_gender_mean"+m_DipSexChrLetter,meanX));
00100     m_SummaryStats[m_SummaryStats.size()-1].push_back(ChipSummary::Metric(m_GenderName + "_gender_mean"+m_HapSexChrLetter,meanY));
00101 
00102     affx::Gender call = affx::UnknownGender;
00103     if (meanX == 0.0) {
00104         fRatio = numeric_limits<double>::quiet_NaN();
00105         m_SummaryStats[m_CelNames.size()-1].push_back(ChipSummary::Metric(m_GenderName + "_gender_ratio",(double)0.0));
00106         //strm << "Gender call for sample " << (m_CelNames.size() + 1) << ": meanY=" << meanY << "; meanX=" << meanX << "; ratio=Undefined" ;
00107         //Verbose::out(2, strm.str());
00108         return call;
00109     }
00110 
00111     fRatio = meanY / meanX;
00112 
00113     m_SummaryStats[m_CelNames.size()-1].push_back(ChipSummary::Metric(m_GenderName + "_gender_ratio",fRatio));
00114 
00115     if (fRatio < m_FemaleThresh) {
00116         call = affx::Female;
00117     } else if (fRatio > m_MaleThresh) {
00118         call = affx::Male;
00119     }
00120     std::stringstream strm;
00121     strm << "Gender call for sample " << cel->GetFileName() << ": mean" << m_HapSexChrLetter << "=" << meanY << "; mean" << m_DipSexChrLetter << "=" << meanX << "; ratio=" << fRatio;
00122     Verbose::out(2, strm.str());
00123     return call;
00124 }
00125 
00126 CnProbeGenderCelListener::CnProbeGenderCelListener(const string &chrXProbeFile, 
00127                                                    const string &chrYProbeFile,
00128                                                    double femaleThresh, 
00129                                                    double maleThresh, 
00130                                                    bool chrZW) {
00131     m_ZWGenderCalling = chrZW;
00132 
00133     if (m_ZWGenderCalling) {
00134         m_DipSexChrLetter = "Z";
00135         m_HapSexChrLetter = "W";
00136     }
00137     else {
00138         m_DipSexChrLetter = "X";
00139         m_HapSexChrLetter = "Y";
00140     }
00141 
00142     if (chrXProbeFile.empty())
00143         Err::errAbort("No chr"+m_DipSexChrLetter+" probe id file specified. Unable to run CnProbeGenderCelListener.");
00144 
00145     if (chrYProbeFile.empty())
00146         Err::errAbort("No chr"+m_HapSexChrLetter+" probe id file specified. Unable to run CnProbeGenderCelListener.");
00147 
00148     EngineUtil::readProbeFile(m_ChrXProbes, chrXProbeFile);
00149     EngineUtil::readProbeFile(m_ChrYProbes, chrYProbeFile);
00150 
00151     initialize(femaleThresh, maleThresh);
00152 }
00153 
00154 CnProbeGenderCelListener::CnProbeGenderCelListener(const std::vector< std::vector<probeid_t> >& chrXProbes,
00155                                                    const std::vector< std::vector<probeid_t> >& chrYProbes,
00156                                                    double femaleThresh, 
00157                                                    double maleThresh, 
00158                                                    bool chrZW)
00159 {
00160     m_ZWGenderCalling = chrZW;
00161 
00162     if (m_ZWGenderCalling) {
00163         m_DipSexChrLetter = "Z";
00164         m_HapSexChrLetter = "W";
00165     }
00166     else {
00167         m_DipSexChrLetter = "X";
00168         m_HapSexChrLetter = "Y";
00169     }
00170     m_ChrXProbes = chrXProbes;
00171     m_ChrYProbes = chrYProbes;
00172     initialize(femaleThresh, maleThresh);
00173 }
00174 
00175 void CnProbeGenderCelListener::initialize(double femaleThresh, double maleThresh)
00176 {
00177     stringstream strm;
00178     for ( unsigned int i = 0 ; i < m_ChrXProbes . size(); i ++ )
00179         strm << "Read " << m_ChrXProbes[i].size() << " " << m_DipSexChrLetter << " probes on channel "<< i << ",";
00180     for ( unsigned int i = 0 ; i < m_ChrYProbes . size(); i ++ )
00181         strm << "Read " << m_ChrYProbes[i].size() << " " << m_HapSexChrLetter << " probes on channel "<< i << ",";
00182     Verbose::out(2, strm.str());
00183 
00184     if(m_ChrXProbes.empty())
00185         Verbose::out(1, "WARNING: No chr" + m_DipSexChrLetter + " probes loaded. Unable to run CnProbeGenderCelListener.");
00186 
00187     if(m_ChrYProbes.empty())
00188         Verbose::out(1, "WARNING: No chr" + m_HapSexChrLetter + " probes loaded. Unable to run CnProbeGenderCelListener.");
00189 
00190     m_GenderName="cn-probe-chr"+m_DipSexChrLetter+m_HapSexChrLetter+"-ratio";
00191     m_GenderDescription="copy number probe chr"+m_DipSexChrLetter+"/"+m_HapSexChrLetter+" ratio";
00192 
00193     m_FemaleThresh = femaleThresh;
00194     m_MaleThresh = maleThresh;
00195 
00196     declareMetric(m_GenderName + "_gender_mean"+m_DipSexChrLetter, ChipSummary::Metric::Double);
00197     declareMetric(m_GenderName + "_gender_mean"+m_HapSexChrLetter, ChipSummary::Metric::Double);
00198     declareMetric(m_GenderName + "_gender_ratio", ChipSummary::Metric::Double);
00199     declareMetric(m_GenderName + "_gender",       ChipSummary::Metric::String);
00200 }
